songs.title: Dirty Sheets
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dirty houses, dirty sheets
Wonder bra and unclean feet
Happened once and happened twice
I wanted a slice of you

[Pre-Chorus: 1]
Female guilt is a fast swimmer
I want to be the only winner
Of your body
Let's skip the pretenses of dinner

[Chorus]
True love isn't enough for us
True love isn't found like this,
I should think before I kiss
Frogs who will never become princes

[Verse 2]
Fantasies, they keep me dry
Apple of my daddy's eye
Taught me sex was a bad thing,
Gave me deviant longing

[Pre-Chorus: 2]
Female guilt, it grabs you by the balls,
It flys and it runs and it dances and crawls
Let us make believe we have it all

[Chorus Variation]
True love isn't enough for us
True love isn't found like this
I should think before I kiss
Frogs who will never become princes (Yeah)
Princes (Yeah)

[Chorus]
True love isn't for us
True love isn't found like this
I should think before I kiss
Frogs who will never become princes
